S

sendExitStatus(int) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.server.TicTacToeServer
Sends a Integer when the game is finished. 0 means that server and client will close, 1 means play another game
sendSizeToClient() - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.server.TicTacToeServer
Sends the size of the field to the client
set0() - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.gui.TicTacToeJButton
If there is no 'o' in the button it sets it to 'o'
setMovePlayer1(int) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.field.TicTacToe
Sets the move of player 1.
setMovePlayer2(int) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.field.TicTacToe
Sets the move of player 2.
setMyMove(int) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.client.TicTacToeClient
Sends the move of the client to the server.
setMyMove(int) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.server.TicTacToeServer
Sends the move of the server to the client.
setStatusBarText(String) - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.gui.TicTacToeJFrame
Sets the text of the status bar
setX() - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.gui.TicTacToeJButton
If there is no 'x' in the button it sets it to 'x'
someoneCanWin() - Method in class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.field.TicTacToe
Returns true if someone can still win the game
Sound - Class in com.ffeichta.tictactoe.sounds
This class contains a method called "playSound()" which is used tho play a winning sound after a player wins
Sound() - Constructor for class com.ffeichta.tictactoe.sounds.Sound
